# This is Jeff's awesome website

![](https://media.giphy.com/media/drXGoW1iudhKw/giphy.gif)

## Here are some plots that can be made

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

df= tibble(
   x=rnorm(100, 2, 5),
   y= 1 + 2*x - 0.5*x^2 +rnorm(100)
)
ggplot(df,aes(x=x, y=y))+
   geom_point()
```
